articles.author: Tom Perkins
articles.title: Asian Americans have much higher ‘forever chemicals’ levels than other groups, study finds - The Guardian
articles.description: Median level of PFAS was 88% higher for Asian Americans than non-Hispanic whites, research using novel method shows
articles.content:
Asian Americans likely have much higher levels of forever chemicals in their blood than other US races and ethnicities, research using a novel method for measuring PFAS exposure finds.
